item.description: Price: (as of – Details) ⭐Wide compatibility: D1 PRO’s smart HDMI box has 4 HDMI ports, no need to repeatedly plug and unplug each multimedia, no matter which media you choose: TV, PC monitor, PS5, Switch or other devices with HDMI ports – Lights all change automatically with zero lag. And D1 PRO has no ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $209.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:34 UTC – Details)



Wide compatibility: D1 PRO’s smart HDMI box has 4 HDMI ports, no need to repeatedly plug and unplug each multimedia, no matter which media you choose: TV, PC monitor, PS5, Switch or other devices with HDMI ports – Lights all change automatically with zero lag. And D1 PRO has no video format restrictions, supports resolution 4K 60HZ (3860*2140P) input and output, Dolby DTS and other audio output.
Unmatched Color Accuracy: The D1 PRO uses an FPGA-based controller board and applies it to a light bar with ARGB LEDs, each light strip contains 60 ARGB LED beads per meter, ensuring it delivers vivid color reproduction every time. Through advanced AI programming, each LED light bead is intelligently controlled to provide stable, accurate, vivid and zero-lag color effects, which will provide extra light to the room while reducing eye strain when viewing in low light conditions pressure.
Personalization: D1 PRO has 15 light modes to immerse you in a visual wonderland and explore the infinite possibilities of lighting. It also comes with an easy-to-use remote, so you can change the color or brightness of the light whenever you want, depending on your mood or need, providing exciting lighting effects for music, videos and games.
Friendly Design and Easy to Use: We offer different sizes to match any screen from 32 inches to 120 inches, please buy as you need. At the same time, our LED light bar has a protective layer, which can be cut to the length you need along the dotted line according to your personal needs. All you need to do is plug the cable into the HDMI signal box and attach the strip to the back of the TV/Monitor screen to use (we come with the part to attach the LED strip).

Product Description

COLOR
Multi Color White Blue Colorful White Red

Super Easy to Install

The car interior lights are pre-installed with optical fibers, which can be directly inserted into the gap of the center console, and the operation is simple.

High Quality LED Strip

Our car led lights are bright, waterproof and anti-collision. High-brightness led strip lights, lighting is more uniform. The colors and light effects are brighter.

Music Sync

The control button of the interior car lights can switch between different lighting modes with one key control. The controller has a built-in high-sensitivity microphone, which allows the interior lights to change with the rhythm of your favorite songs.

Car Decoration

With this interior light, you won’t get bored while driving. The lights of the light bar can dance with the music, as if you are in a fairy tale world, surrounded by “rainbow”, and accompany you through the long road.

Decorate Your Room

Our led strip lights are romantic creators, with soft and gorgeous lighting adding mood. Allows you to relax your mind while staying in your room.

For Family and Friends

The colorful lights of the LED strips create an exclusive party space for you, allowing you to have a party with your family and friends at any time. Create colorful life

【2022 Upgraded Version,Super Easy to Install】：The optical fiber of interior car lights has been pre-installed, and it can be directly inserted into the gap of the center console, and the operation is simple. Car led lights with USB plugs, plug and play, save more time. Suitable for RVs, camping cars, trailers, cars, trucks, SUVs, ATVs, boats, golf carts, etc.
【Sensitive Music Sensor】: The interior car lights system is equipped with a sound sensor to synchronize the car led lights with the music beat. The LED light strips will automatically change with the rhythm of music or sound to enhance your driving pleasure.
【Multiple Modes & 16 Million Colors】: Our car led lights has 3 light flashing modes, rhythm mode, cycle mode and fixed color mode, which can be switched by pressing the remote control button. There are 16 million colors in the luminous car interior lights, and you can adjust the color you like according to your mood or activity.
【2-wire Concealed Design & Safety 】: This led lights for car adopts a convenient, flexible and unique two-in-one design, which makes it easier to hide the thread in the gap, without worrying about exposed wiring or untidy appearance.The interior car lights is DC5v, built-in fuse, with short circuit protection and memory function. It has good waterproof performance and extremely low heat.
【Perfect Gift and Customer Service】: This Led Car Interior Lights are colorful gifts for your friends and familly in holiday season, especially in christams. Theses strip lights are fun accessories for women, men and teens.Our professional customer service team is on call at any time to provide excellent, lightning-fast response to each of your questions.

From the brand

Make life better by controlling everything in the palm of your hand. From intuitive lights to automated home devices, our smart products lineup elevates moods, moments, and beyond.

Top-tier quality made accessible for any home.

Smart Devices

For the Planet

Part of our mission is to make homes safer, cozier, and happier to live in. And that includes our biggest home – the planet.

That’s why we’ve made sure every Vont product comes with a link to an online instruction manual, so your devices are always ready to make life easier, right out of the box.

DRIVE IN A GALAXY OF COLOR LIGHTS | CUSTOMIZE YOUR CAR – Choose from 16 million colors and 30 unique scene modes. DIY effects, adjust brightness, and personalize this RGB LED strip to transform your daily drives into vibrant road trips.
QUICK SETUP | EASY CONTROL W/ VONT HOME APP – Just plug it in, power on, and lay out the 21-feet, single-design strip light suitable for various car models. Secure with the cable ties/stickers included and wirelessly control with the app or via a convenient controller.
﻿LIGHTS JAM W/ YOUR FAVORITE BEATS | ENJOY MUSIC MODE – Vont Car Lights built-in mic syncs with your car’s music in real-time, letting you experience a colorful car karaoke with your favorite beats.
﻿SAFE TO USE & WATER-RESISTANT – The interior strip light’s robust built comes with safety features to make you feel extra secure. It’s flame retardant, water-resistant, has a high-temp resistance, and is harmless to kids.
﻿24/7 CUSTOMER CARE & LIFETIME WARRANTY – Covered for life, it’s warranted against loss, theft, and defects in materials and workmanship as long as you own your car lights. Vont Customer Satisfaction Wizards are with you 24/7 – for life.

Next Level Interior Safety

Vont Smart Car Strip Light’s sophisticated engineering makes sure you always feel secure with its safety features. Rated with IP20 (only for indoor use), it’s water-resistant, flame retardant, and super-safe to touch.

Activate Rhythmic Roadtrips

Color lights are one thing, but having lights that dance to the beat of your music is beyond everyday driving. Activate Music Mode and witness your strip lights sync with your car’s music and unbreakable car karaoke.

Four Mighty Light Strips

The single-design build features four strip lights with twelve powerful LEDs per light. Every LED is meticulously designed to bring you high-grade light that when combined, produces its 16 million-color dazzling brilliance – rousing your car to life.

From the brand

Smart Lighting Expert

How did we get our start?

Break out of the box and make ordinary things more interesting.

Why do we love what we do?

Interest will be the source of all motivation, and work can make your ideas come true one by one.

What problem are we solving?

We have been making progress by maintaining an outstanding “Quality Products” ratio for our products.

DIY Modes: Car led lights has 16 million colors, or custom the colors and adjust the brightness through the smart app’s color palette, Let you easily create your own car atmosphere.Perfect for decorating cars for Halloween and Christmas.
Scenario Modes: Led lights for car has 28 dynamic modes for you to choose, or customize the parameters of led strip lights (automatic, flash, jump,fade in and out,brightness adjustment,speed adjustment) Please feel free to use your imagination.
Dynamic Music Sync: The lights of led car light will change in sync with the rhythm of the song or music. Let the lights dance with your music and enhance your driving pleasure.
3 Types Control: 44-key RF remote control with its own battery, 4-button control box with built-in sensitive microphone, and Bluetooth Smart APP.
2-Line Design: 1 main line separated into 2 branch lines, as long as the line is hidden under the car mat, without having to worry about exposed wiring or an untidy appearance.the best choice for truck accessories and jeep accessories.
3 Installation Methods: Strong Glue, Screws, Hook and Loop Tape, built-in overvoltage fuse, led interior car lights can adheres very well to different surfaces and very safe,extremely low-heat, touchable.
Gifts for Men and Women: These RGB music car led floor lights always bring joy to him or her, are easy to use, and are a great choice for a birthday gift.

Read more

For Friend:

It is now, let’s create a car light party together.

For Family:

Bring your children together to enjoy the fun of intelligent technology

For Lovers:

Let the colorful lights accompany you and your lover on a romantic trip.

Read more

Read more

Read more

Package Contains

Car Cigarette lighter / LED Strip Light / Fuse / RF Remote Control / Hook and Loop Tape / Screws / Cable Ties / User Manuals

3 Installation Method

Strong Glue / Screws / Hook and Loop Tape.

Compatibility

It works on any vehicle that has a 12v power adapter. Also known as the cigarette lighter.

Working Temperature

-10℃~45℃/(14℉~113℉)

Specification:

  • Chips: 5050 SMD
  • Input: AC 100-240V / 50-60Hz
  • Output: DC 12V=2A
  • Power: Car Cigarette lighter
  • Light strip length: 230mm / (9in)
  • Power cord length: 460mm / 1160mm / 1720mm (18in*45in*64in)

Can it be set to automatically come on when you enter the car？

  • Yes if you leave it plugged in with the power button on, it will power on and off with your car’s ignition and it will keep the color you set last time.

How to connect the Smart APP?

  1. Scan the QR code on the box to download the smart APP
  2. Open your phone Bluetooth to search for led lights devices, device name format: KSxx-xxxxxx
  3. Forbid to click the led lights device name directly, they will be connected automatically when you enter the APP.
  4. Enter the smart APP, click car light to start your technology journey.

They’re broken,can I get replacements?

  • Yes,Don’t worry, Don’t be shy, please tell us that if there is any quality problem with the product, We will help you until you are satisfied.

User Guide:

  • Use “cloth” or “paper towel” to clean the surface of the object where the car led lights will be installed.
  • Separate the tape from the backing layer.Paste the led strip lights on the surface of the object and press hard to make it fit more evenly and tightly.
  • The adhesive strength of the glue is related to time, the adhesive strength after the first paste is 40% of its maximum adhesion, and it takes 72 hours to reach the maximum adhesive strength.
  • If you have any question about our product, please go to your Amazon product page “Sold” – “Question”.

Product Description

Wonderful Gift & Decoration

LED atmosphere speakers blend well with room decors, it’s a great gift for birthday/housewarming

Torch Light Bluetooth Speakers

Bluetooth speakers with lights easily create you a sweet weekend and romantic evening experience.

Multi-Sync Connection

Sync up to 100 flame Bluetooth speakers together to get a more immersive sound experience.

IPX5 Waterproof

This speaker can stand up to splashes, spills, and light rain. Great for use by the pool or beach.

1 Wonderful Gift & Decors 2 LED Flame Light 3 Multi-Sync Connection 4 IPX5 Waterproof

360° Surround & HD Sound

Enjoy stunningly balanced sound with great clarity thanks to its cutting-edge DSP technology. Pair 2 speakers together to enjoy 360° room-filling sound. Pair more speakers together to get a more immersive sound experience for big events and parties.

Long Last Battery Life

Built-in new upgrade lithium-ion rechargeable battery, KUCCHERO outdoor speaker offers music up to 12 hours per charge and lasts over 24 hours as a table lamp, creating natural & realistic flames, which is perfect for outdoor / indoor decoration.

Premium Bluetooth Version 5.0

Boasting the latest, lightning-fast Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity protocol, the speaker pairs with Bluetooth-enabled devices like smart phones and additional KUCCHERO speakers within a range of 80 feet (no barriers), automatically reconnects to the last device used.

3 Lighting Modes

In flickering flame light mode, natural, realistic dancing flames form a lively campfire atmosphere. In candlelight mode, the breathing light creates a romantic atmosphere and helps users fall asleep faster. In full brightness mode, it adds 360° illumination to your space.

Technical Specifications

Audio Output 10W Distortion < 6% Sound Quality DSP Balanced Technology Connection Type Bluetooth 5.0, Aux Input Lights 3 Modes, 3 Levels of brightness Charing Port Type-C Charging Time 2.5 Hours Product Size 4″ Φ x 7″ H / unit Mounting Mode Hook for Hang, Wall-Mount, Stake

4-in-1 Upgraded Outdoor Bluetooth Speakers – This 360° LED atmosphere speaker combines 4 functions in 1: Portable Wireless Speaker, Atmosphere Lamp, LED Night Light, and Decoration Lantern. Cutting-edge DSP technology gives a well-balanced sound with great clarity. Its crystal clear sound and optional light effects easily set the right atmosphere for any occasion. Perfect for bringing premium music, illumination, and ambiance to your home, party, patio, fire pit, backyard, beach, camping trips
Support Multi-point Connections, Loud 360° Surround Sound – The latest technology allows you to sync up to 100 KUCCHERO flame Bluetooth speakers. Pair 2 speakers together to enjoy 360° room-filling sound. Pair more speakers together to get a more immersive sound experience for big events and outdoor parties
Bluetooth Speakers with Light Show – Press the light button to toggle between 3 different lighting modes or turn the light off. In flickering flame light mode, natural, realistic dancing flames form a lively campfire atmosphere. In candlelight mode, the breathing light creates a romantic atmosphere and helps users fall asleep faster. In full brightness mode, it adds 360° illumination to your space. Warm light makes LED flame speakers nice outdoor Christmas decorations and Christmas gifts
IPX5 Water Resistant – This portable outdoor speaker can stand up to splashes, spills, and light rain. Great for use by the pool or beach. Enjoy crisp, loud and clear music via Bluetooth 5.0 or the AUX jack. With the latest Type-C charging port, you can enjoy loud and clear sound and exciting light effects for hours on a single charge
Wonderful Decoration & Gift Ideas: Portable LED atmosphere Bluetooth speakers blend well with modern room decor and are easy to carry around, making them great camping gifts, housewarming gifts, birthday gifts for men and women, teenage girls and boys. 2 hooks, 2 stakes, and 2 wall mounts are included for easy placement
